nodes.bodyText: Can we list the fixes that went into 3.0.2 for user reference?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,8 +6,9 @@ draft: false
 
 ### Recent changes
 
-| Date | Version | Introduces backward incompatibilities | Change |
+| Date | Version | Introduces backward incompatibilities? | Changes |
 | --- | --- | --- | --- |
+| September 15, 2020 | v3.0.2 | no | This release contains several fixes, including improvements to log rotation and a fix that avoids unnecessarily updating the domain status. |

nodes.bodyText: Changes -> Change (I let this go before but it was a mistake. It should be singular, Change, just like all the other headings are singular, Date, Version, Issue, and Description. The question mark after Introduces backward incompatibilities? is ok.) I looked at the Change log in the Hugo UI and it all looks fine, definitely good to go.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ date: 2019-03-15T11:25:28-04:00
 draft: false
 ---
 
-### Recent changes
+### Releases
 
 | Date | Version | Introduces backward incompatibilities? | Changes |
